title: D.C. Saw 227 Homicides This Year, The Most Since 2003
description: Domestic violence accounts for part of the surge, though Black men still make up the vast majority of homicide victims in the city.
cleaned_text: This website uses cookies so that we can provide you with the best user experience possible.
